metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

sub_section_analysis.refined_text:    Ingredients : o   Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi    Instructions : o   Prepare each side dish separately.  o   Arrange on small plates.  o   Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

   Ingredients : o   Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto)  o   Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone)  o   Olives  o   Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers)  o   Breadsticks    Instructions : o   Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.  o   Serve with breadsticks.
•   In a bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion. •   Season with salt and pepper. •   Serve on lettuce leaves or whole grain bread.
•   In a bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, avocado, and cherry tomatoes. •   Top with the poached or fried egg. •   Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. •   Serve immediately.
•   1 cup rolled oats •   2 cups water or milk •   1/4 teaspoon salt •   Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, honey, cinnamon
